A lasso also referred to as a lariat, riata, or reata is a loop of rope designed as a 
restraint to be thrown around a target and tightened when pulled. It is a well-
known tool of the American cowboy. The word is also a verb; to lasso is to throw 
the loop of rope around ... A lasso is made from stiff rope so that the noose stays 
open when the lasso...
